property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack this card regardless of Superstar. Any player plays a card with the same title as a card in his Ring: his opponent draws up to 1 card. If your logo is on this card: you are a Member of this Faction and you start the match.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution ECW Originals' Faction in your Ring. If this card reverses from Arsenal: put this card into your Ring and if you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'ECW Originals' Faction Members and/or cards with 'ECW Originals' in the text in your Ring, you may discard 1 Reversal: put up to 1 Pre-match Event from his Ring into his Ringside and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution ECWÂ½ Originals' Faction in your Ring. Put 1 Maneuver from your Ring into your Ringside. If your next card this turn is a Core, it has Momentum and triple its Damage. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'ECW Originals' Faction Members and/or cards with 'ECW Originals' in the text in your Ring, put up to 1 non-Unique Maneuver from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside

property.name: Card Text

If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'ECW Originals' Faction Members and/or cards with 'ECW Originals' in the text in your Ring, search your Arsenal for up to 1 Extreme, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution Worth the Price of Admission

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution ECWÂ½ Originals' Faction in your Ring. Put 3 non-Unique cards from your Ring into your Ringside. Your next card this turn has Momentum. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'ECW Originals' Faction Members and/or cards with 'ECW Originals' in the text in your Ring, put up to 2 Uniques from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: CM Punk, Elijah Burke, Kevin Thorn, Matt Striker, Marcus Cor Von

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack this card regardless of Superstar. If you are not an Extremist: discard 1 card. You are considered an Extremist. If your logo is on this card: you are a Member of this Faction and if your opponent reverses a Mean from his hand or Backlash: he discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution The New Breed' Faction in your Ring. Your Extreme Cores are instead Means. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'The New Breed' Faction Members and/or cards with 'The New Breed' in the text in your Ring, search your opponent's Arsenal for up to 2 cards, put them into his Ringside, and he shuffles his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution The New Breed' Faction in your Ring. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'The New Breed' Faction Members and/or cards with 'The New Breed' in the text in your Ring, shuffle up to 6 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution The New Breed' Faction in your Ring. Put up to 1 Extreme from your Ringside into your hand. Your opponent's non-Unique Maneuvers are Extremes in addition to their printed type. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'The New Breed' Faction Members and/or cards with 'The New Breed' in the text in your Ring, your opponent puts 3 cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution The New Breed' Faction in your Ring. Put up to 2 Assaults and/or Extremes from your Ringside into your hand. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'The New Breed' Faction Members and/or cards with 'The New Breed' in the text in your Ring, put up to 1 non-Unique from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text

If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'The Degenerates' Faction Members and/or cards with 'The Degenerates' in the text in your Ring, look at the top 10 cards of your Arsenal and put them back on the top and/or bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Reversal: card with 'Faction' in the text

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Attitude Adjusters' Faction in your Ring. Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card with 'Attitude' in the title, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Attitude Adjusters' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Attitude Adjusters' in the text in your Ring, the first card on your next turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Attitude Adjusters' Faction in your Ring and Less Fortitude. Look at your opponent's hand and choose up to 1 card: he discards it. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Attitude Adjusters' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Attitude Adjusters' in the text in your Ring, put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Attitude Adjusters' Faction in your Ring. Draw up to 1 card. If a Maneuver has dealt its Damage to you and is not reversed: you may put this card into your Ringside and end your opponent's turn. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Attitude Adjusters' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Attitude Adjusters' in the text in your Ring, put up to 3 Reversals from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Attitude Adjusters' Faction in your Ring and More Fortitude. If your next card this turn is a Maneuver, it is instead considered a Trademark and cannot be reversed by Mid-match Reversals. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Attitude Adjusters' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Attitude Adjusters' in the text in your Ring, if your next card this turn is a Maneuver, it is +10D.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Batista, Edge, John Cena, Leader of the Edge Army, Randy Orton

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack this card regardless of Superstar. Superstar Value: +1 Your opponent plays a Title Belt: draw up to 1 card. If your logo is on this card: you are a Member of this Faction and the maximum Pre-match you may have in your Ring is increased by 1.

card.name: Revolution Even Good Guys Do Bad Things

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Tomorrow's WWEÂ½ Legends' Faction in your Ring. When your opponent discards any number of cards on his turn, draw up to 1 card. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' in the text in your Ring, if your opponent successfully plays a non-Unique Antic, you may put this card into your Ringside: it is blank until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Tomorrow's WWEÂ½ Legends' Faction in your Ring. At least 5 Less Fortitude: -5F. Your next card this turn is -15F. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' in the text in your Ring, put up to 3 Maneuvers from your Ringside into your hand.

card.name: Revolution Caution: You're Entering the O-Zone

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Tomorrow's WWEÂ½ Legends' Faction in your Ring. Put up to 1 card from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' in the text in your Ring, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 'Revolution Tomorrow's WWEÂ½ Legends' Faction in your Ring. During your turn, if this card is in your Ring, you may discard 2 cards: put this card into your hand. If you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' Faction Members and/or cards with 'Tomorrow's WWE Legends' in the text in your Ring, during your turn, if this card is in your Ringside, you may discard 2 cards: put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, put up to 1 Maneuver with 'chop' or 'punch' in the title or Target 'leg' from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 4 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your first card on your next turn is -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have greater Fortitude than your opponent: this card has Momentum.

card.name: Revolution The Founder of the Four Horsemen

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Superstar Value: +4 New Superstar Ability: Replace 'Assault,' 'Hold,' or 'Throw' with 'Assault, Hold, and Throw' in the rules bar of your F:0 Reversals with 'Reversal: printed #Dâˆ™#D Assault/Hold/Throw.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent may discard 4 random cards and overturn 4 cards: put this card into your Ringside and end your turn. If he does not: put up to 4 cards from your Ringside on top of your Arsenal, search your Arsenal for up to 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Superstar Value is greater than your opponent's: -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards 2 cards. Shuffle up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 Antic: look at the top 7 cards of your Arsenal, put up to 1 in your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Overturned If your opponent looks at your hand and forces you to discard a card of his choice: he chooses this card instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Less Fortitude Put up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. If your next card this turn is a Maneuver, it has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 card from your hand, up to 1 card from your Ringside, and up to 1 other card from your Ring on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may shuffle up to 1 card from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have at least 10 less Fortitude than your opponent: -20F. Put up to 3 Antics from your Ringside into your hand.

card.name: Revolution For Many Are Called But Few Are Chosen

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Superstar Value: +2 New Superstar Ability: The first Antic of each of your turns is -1F times the number of Maneuvers in your Ringside.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Mean: Follow-up: Card / Reversal: Follow-up

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 Maneuver from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your opponent's Arsenal for up to 1 card and put it into his Ringside: he shuffles his Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Colossal: follow-up: Card / Reversal: Assault or Extreme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: put up to 3 cards from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may put up to 6 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to the same number of cards and your next Maneuver this turn is -3F and +1D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 3 cards. Your next card this turn is -16F.

card.name: Revolution A Decade of Whoopinâ€™ A%$

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Fewer Cards in Hand Your next Maneuver this turn has Momentum and is +10D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may overturn cards until you overturn a non-Hybrid Maneuver: put it into your hand.

card.name: Revolution Do I Have Your Attention...?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players discard 1 random card. Put up to 3 non-Uniques from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 4 cards. Superstar Value: +1 New Superstar Ability: Successfully play a Maneuver and you have 6 or more cards in your Ring with the same Target: put up to 1 card from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside; if he then has no non-Permanent cards in his Ring, he loses via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If 'Revolution Do I Have Your Attention...?' is in your Ring: put up to 3 cards from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Not Your Opponent's First Card This Turn

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played after a card with 'kick' in the title: -16F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-Unique non-Hybrid Maneuver, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal: your opponent draws up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Not Your Opponent's First Card This Turn If the first card on your next turn is a Maneuver: it is -7F.

card.name: Revolution The Earth Trembles at My Gaze

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand. Put up to 1 non-Unique from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have fewer cards in hand than your opponent: he discards 5 cards. If you have more cards in hand than your opponent: search your Arsenal for up to 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have less Fortitude than your opponent: -20F. Your opponent overturns 7 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. New Superstar Ability: You cannot play non-Unique F:0 Reversals from your hand. Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 Reversal: put up to 2 non-Uniques from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent randomly puts all cards in his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal except for 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put cards from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside equal up to the number of different Targets in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have greater Fortitude than your opponent: this card has Momentum. You win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Successfully play a Maneuver, you may overturn 1 card: put up to 1 non-Core Maneuver from your Ringside into your hand. Successfully play a card with 'Samoa' in the title: put up to 3 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 Maneuver, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have less Fortitude than your opponent: put up to 1 non-Unique from his Ring into his Ringside.

card.name: Revolution The Samoan Diving Head Butt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: Mean: Follow-up: Maneuver Your next card this turn is -35F.

card.name: Revolution Vince McMahon's Billion Dollar Representative

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Value: +5 New Superstar Ability: Your opponent reverses a Mean from his Backlash or Arsenal: draw cards equal up to the number of different Targets in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your hand. Your next card this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal equal up to the number of cards in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have greater Fortitude than your opponent: this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent reverses a card from his hand: put up to 1 non-Unique non-Hybrid non-Extreme Maneuver from your Ringside into your hand. During your opponent's turn, if you have less Fortitude than him: your Fortitude is considered the same as his.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Assault, Hold, Throw, or Extreme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Fewer Cards in Hand and First Card This Turn Draw up to 4 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-Unique, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: put up to 2 non-Pre-match from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent overturns cards equal to 15 minus his Superstar Value.

card.name: Revolution Demon of Death Valley's Chokeslam

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 15 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution The Conscience of the WWE

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 3 cards. New Superstar Ability: The first printed Mean of each of your turns cannot be reversed by F:0 cards. Once per game, during your turn, you may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: put up to 1 Assault, up to 1 Hold, up to 1 Throw, and up to 1 Reversal from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn up to 6 cards: put up to the same number of cards from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is overturned, you may discard 1 card: put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: your opponent discards his hand.
